amendment.description: Amendment sunsets discretionary programs in the bill upon the expiration of the five-year authorization period.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 58 printed in Part B of House Report 113-117 to sunset all discretionary programs in the bill upon the expiration of the 5-year authorization period.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Foxx amendment (A051) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Foxx amendment (A051) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A051) offered by Ms. Foxx.
